ygData.subject: Re: Song 43
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The whole point of using mana for the lvl 43rd song is to put a long delay between uses due to its power.  Think of the mana bar as the timer controlling
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Song 43
>Date: Fri, 11 Jun 1999 15:48:01 -0400
>
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
>Forget any, we should get med hands down....If any, let alone one song uses
>mana, and alot if not all of it at that, we should be able to med.


The whole point of using mana for the lvl 43rd song is to put a long delay
between uses due to its power. Think of the mana bar as the 'timer'
controlling how often you can use this song.

Rokenn Swiftsong
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Karana Server
